ing: 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
2 1/2 tablespoons chocolate-hazelnut spread, such as NutellaÂ®
des: "This light, creamy dip tastes great paired with strawberries, bananas, or apples. Try a spoonful on top of pound cake or angel food cake, it's delicious!"
ins: In a large bowl, beat the cream cheese, marshmallow cream, and whipped topping with an electric mixer until smooth. Stir in cinnamon, vanilla, and chocolate-hazelnut spread. Pour dip into a serving dish and cover with plastic wrap. Refrigerate for 1 hour before serving.
